attributes.additional_details:
Reduce the price of ink cartridges for PC Printers.

The price of these items are a joke and it seems all the companies are in the same boat ripping of the consumer. How can these cost more per litre that the most expensive bottle of Malt Whisky, Brandy or Champagne.

It's time the government came down on the companies like these and get rid of THE RIP OF BRITAIN IMAGE
